creator: andy.mcbride@dsl.pipex.com
text:
Attempting to set a threshold on an appender via a config file results in a 
warning being displayed: 

0 [main] WARN org.apache.log4j.config.PropertySetter - Failed to set property 
[threshold] to value "debug".

The cause of the error is not printed due to PropertySetter not logging the 
caught exception correctly.  This has been raised under a separate bugreport.  

When the Level extends Priority relationship was recently restored, 
PropertySetter was not also restored to cope with the difference. 

The attached patch should enable PropertySetter to handle either scenario.

creator: andy.mcbride@dsl.pipex.com
text:
Created attachment 17507
enable PropertySetter to handle either Priority or Level
